title: Diabolocatantops pinguis
text: Diabolocatantops pinguis is a species of <a href="grasshopper">grasshopper</a>s in the subfamily <a href="Catantopinae">Catantopinae</a> and tribe <a href="Catantopini">Catantopini</a>. This species can be found in the Indian subcontinent, China and <a href="Indo-China">Indo-China</a>. No subspecies are listed in the <a href="Catalogue%20of%20Life">Catalogue of Life</a>.
